    • Method Detail

      • getAirports

        public static java.lang.String getAirports​(java.lang.String teamName)
        Return a query string that can be passed to HTTP URL to request list of airports
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to specify the data copy on server
        Returns:
        the query String which can be appended to URL to form HTTP GET request

      • getAirplanes

        public static java.lang.String getAirplanes​(java.lang.String teamName)
        Return a query string that can be passed to HTTP URL to request list of airplanes
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to specify the data copy on server
        Returns:
        the query String which can be appended to URL to form HTTP GET request

      • lock

        public static java.lang.String lock​(java.lang.String teamName)
        Lock the server database so updates can be written
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to acquire the lock
        Returns:
        the String written to HTTP POST to lock server database

      • getDepartureFlights

        public static java.lang.String getDepartureFlights​(java.lang.String teamName,
                                                   java.lang.String code,
                                                   java.lang.String date)
        Return a query string that can be passed to HTTP URL to request list of flights
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to specify the data copy on server
        code - is the 3 character departing airport code
        date - is the departing date in GMT
        Returns:
        the query String which can be appended to URL to form HTTP GET request

      • getArrivalFlights

        public static java.lang.String getArrivalFlights​(java.lang.String teamName,
                                                 java.lang.String code,
                                                 java.lang.String date)
        Return a query string that can be passed to HTTP URL to request list of flights
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to specify the data copy on server
        code - is the 3 character arrival airport code
        date - is the arrival date in GMT
        Returns:
        the query String which can be appended to URL to form HTTP GET request

      • unlock

        public static java.lang.String unlock​(java.lang.String teamName)
        Unlock the server database after updates are written
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team holding the lock
        Returns:
        the String written to the HTTP POST to unlock server database

      • reserve

        public static java.lang.String reserve​(java.lang.String teamName,
                                       java.lang.String xmlString)
        reserve tickets based on parsed xml string
        Parameters:
        teamName - is the name of the team to reserve
        xmlString - the String written to the HTTP POST to reserve flights
        Returns:
        the String written to the HTTP POST to make reservation on database
